data.name: World of Guns VR: World War II Pack #1
data.detailed_description:
World of Guns VR: World War II Pack unlocks 12 models from World of Guns VR game.

List of models which are included in WWII Pack:
USSR
TT - pistol
DP-27 - machinegun
Mosin-Nagant -rifle
PPSh-41- SMG

Germany
Luger P08 - pistol
MP40 - SMG
Mauser 98K
StG 44 - assault rifle

Great Britain
Lee Enfield No.1 MK III - rifle
Sten MK II - SMG

United States
M1 Garand - rifle
Thompson - SMG

data.short_description: World of Guns VR: World War II Pack unlocks 12 models from World of Guns VR game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.
